casebody.data:
No. 2,

Misc.

Young v. South Carolina. King David for petitioner. Daniel R. McLeod, Attorney General of South Carolina, Everett N. Brandon, Assistant Attorney General, and Leonard A. Williamson for respondent'. Lawrence Speiser for American Civil Liberties Union, as amicus curiae, in support of the petition.

Motion of American Civil Liberties Union for leave to file brief, as amicus curiae, granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of South Carolina denied.
